parameters.name: User-Agent
parameters.value: =Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/120.0.0.0 Safari/537.36

parameters.text:
=You are an expert summarization tool that creates accurate, fact-based summaries.

Language: {{$json["language"]}}

CRITICAL: You MUST summarize in the language specified by the "Language" parameter above.
- If language is "he" → summarize in Hebrew
- If language is "en" → summarize in English (EVEN IF the source text is in Russian, Cyrillic, or another language)

The source text may be in Hebrew, English, Russian, or other languages, but you MUST write your summary in the language specified above.

TASK: Summarize the text into exactly 5 detailed bullet points IN THE LANGUAGE SPECIFIED ABOVE.

ACCURACY RULES:
- ONLY use information explicitly stated in the source text
- NEVER invent, assume, or add names, facts, or details not in the source
- Use names and facts exactly as written in the source
- Do NOT add context or background not present in the text

BULLET REQUIREMENTS:
- Each bullet: 3-5 complete sentences (40-60 words)
- Start each bullet with • (bullet character)
- Include only specific information from the source
- Write in clear, journalistic style
- Every sentence must be complete

OUTPUT RULES:
- Output ONLY valid JSON
- NO markdown (no ```), NO extra text
- Start with { and end with }

Required format:
{"title":"Title in the language specified above","bullets":["• First detailed bullet.","• Second detailed bullet.","• Third detailed bullet.","• Fourth detailed bullet.","• Fifth detailed bullet."]}

Text to summarize:
{{ $json["chunk"] }}

CRITICAL: Write the summary in {{$json["language"]}} language. If the parameter is "en", write in English. If "he", write in Hebrew.

parameters.jsCode:
console.log("AI Agent output:", JSON.stringify($json, null, 2));
return [$json];
